description.@en: Baskets, textiles and ancestral blankets are what I have practiced my hand on.

effect.@en: Record this Talent name by your Skill Ranks— Weaving. Whenever you use a Skill that could be paired with Weaving, ignore any penalties your character is currently suffering from due to your Peril Condition Track. You also gain a +10% Base Chance to use the Skill when paired.
